payload.root_cause: High disk latency on /dev/sda1 caused by high I/O wait, leading to potential service outage.
payload.recommendation:
- Monitor and optimize disk I/O wait by adjusting the I/O scheduler or adding more storage resources. (confidence: 0.9)
- Run a disk check and repair on /dev/sda1 to ensure it's in a healthy state. (confidence: 0.8)
- Consider replacing the disk or adding a redundant storage solution to prevent future outages. (confidence: 0.7)
